name: Feature Heatmap Pyramid
title: Feature Heatmap Pyramid
description: Build a heatmap pyramid for features values in a csv as an overlay for another pyramid.
author: Nick Schaub (nick.schaub@nih.gov)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: inpDir
inputs.description: Input image collection used to build a pyramid that this plugin will make an overlay for

inputs.name: vector
inputs.description: Stitching vector used to buld the image pyramid.

ui.title: Input collection
ui.description: Input image collection used to build a pyramid that this plugin will make an overlay for

ui.title: Stitching Vector
ui.description: Stitching vector used to buld the image pyramid.
